categories.name: LED T-Shirts
categories.description: Interactive T-shirts with LED patterns that react to music and sound

categories.name: Hoodies & Sweaters
categories.description: Comfortable hoodies with integrated LED systems for festival nights

categories.name: Bottoms
categories.description: LED-enhanced pants, shorts, and skirts for the complete festival look

categories.name: Accessories
categories.description: LED accessories including hats, gloves, and wearable tech

categories.name: Festival Sets
categories.description: Complete outfit sets with synchronized LED patterns

products.name: Pulse Wave LED Tee
products.description: Classic festival T-shirt with reactive LED wave patterns that follow the bassline. Equipped with sound-reactive microcontroller and washable LED strips.
products.imagePrompt: A sleek black T-shirt with vibrant blue and purple LED wave patterns flowing across the chest, worn by a person at a night festival with neon lights in the background, music visualization style, dark atmospheric lighting, high-tech aesthetic

products.name: Bass Drop Reactive Shirt
products.description: Premium cotton tee with central LED panel that explodes with color on every bass drop. Features customizable patterns via YoruWear app.
products.imagePrompt: A white festival T-shirt with a large circular LED panel in the center displaying explosive orange and red patterns, person dancing at an electronic music festival, energetic atmosphere, LED stage lights, square format

products.name: Spectrum Analyser Tee
products.description: Advanced LED tee displaying real-time audio spectrum across the chest. Perfect for DJs and music enthusiasts.
products.imagePrompt: A dark gray T-shirt with horizontal LED bars across the chest showing audio frequency spectrum in rainbow colors, techno festival setting, DJ booth in background, futuristic vibe, square composition

products.name: Heartbeat Sync Shirt
products.description: Unique LED shirt that syncs with your heartbeat and the music's BPM. Creates mesmerizing dual-rhythm light shows.
products.imagePrompt: A sleek black T-shirt with red LED lines forming heart rate patterns, person in a crowded festival scene, pulsing lights, medical-tech aesthetic meets rave culture, atmospheric night lighting

products.name: Galaxy Swirl LED Tee
products.description: Cosmic-inspired T-shirt with swirling LED patterns that react to high frequencies. Features starfield animations during quiet moments.
products.imagePrompt: A navy blue T-shirt with spiral galaxy LED patterns in purple, blue and white, cosmic festival theme, space-age design, person against starry night sky background, ethereal lighting

products.name: Beat Thunder Hoodie
products.description: Comfortable festival hoodie with LED lightning patterns on sleeves and hood. Weather-resistant design for outdoor events.
products.imagePrompt: A black hoodie with electric blue lightning bolt LED patterns on the sleeves and hood, worn at an outdoor festival in light rain, dramatic storm-inspired design, moody atmospheric lighting

products.name: Neural Network Hoodie
products.description: Tech-inspired hoodie with interconnected LED nodes that light up in response to sound complexity. Features minimalist design.
products.imagePrompt: A gray hoodie with geometric LED network patterns resembling neural connections, cyberpunk festival aesthetic, neon city lights background, high-tech minimalist design, square format

products.name: Flame Reactive Sweater
products.description: Cozy sweater with flame-pattern LEDs that intensify with music volume. Perfect for chilly festival nights.
products.imagePrompt: A charcoal sweater with orange and red flame LED patterns rising from the bottom, person warming hands near a festival fire pit, cozy yet energetic vibe, warm ambient lighting

products.name: Prism Light Cargo Pants
products.description: Tactical-style cargo pants with LED strips running down the sides. Multiple pockets for festival essentials.
products.imagePrompt: Black cargo pants with rainbow LED strips along the side seams, urban festival setting, person in dynamic pose, street style meets rave fashion, colorful LED underlighting

products.name: Cyber Glow Shorts
products.description: Breathable festival shorts with reactive LED hem and side panels. Ideal for summer festivals and dancing.
products.imagePrompt: Neon green athletic shorts with LED strips around the hem glowing bright blue, summer music festival during sunset, dancing crowd, energetic summer vibe, vibrant colors

products.name: Neon Dreams Skirt
products.description: Flowing A-line skirt with cascading LED patterns. Creates beautiful light trails while dancing.
products.imagePrompt: A flowing black mini skirt with cascading pink and blue LED patterns creating light trails, woman spinning at a night festival, motion blur effects, dreamy ethereal aesthetic

products.name: Rhythm Pulse Bucket Hat
products.description: Classic festival bucket hat with LED brim that pulses to the music. Includes built-in speakers for personal audio.
products.imagePrompt: A black bucket hat with LED strips around the brim pulsing in blue and purple, person wearing it at a festival main stage, crowd in background, festival fashion accessory style

products.name: Bass Reactive Gloves
products.description: LED gloves that light up fingers individually based on music frequency bands. Perfect for light shows and dancing.
products.imagePrompt: Black gloves with LED strips on each finger glowing different colors, hands creating light patterns in the air, dark festival background, rave culture aesthetic, finger light show

products.name: Sound Wave Bandana
products.description: Stylish bandana with embedded LEDs that visualize sound waves. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear.
products.imagePrompt: A dark bandana with LED sound wave patterns in green and yellow, worn around the neck, festival desert setting, bohemian rave aesthetic, artistic lighting

products.name: Infinity Loop Wristband
products.description: Smart LED wristband with infinite loop animations that sync with nearby YoruWear products for group effects.
products.imagePrompt: A sleek LED wristband with flowing light patterns in multiple colors, worn on wrist with festival crowd in background, synchronized group lighting effect, social connection through light

products.name: Festival King Complete Set
products.description: Premium set including LED tee, reactive shorts, and pulse hat. All items sync together for ultimate festival experience.
products.imagePrompt: A complete outfit with matching LED T-shirt, shorts, and bucket hat all synchronized with blue and purple patterns, person at main stage festival, VIP area aesthetic, luxury festival fashion

products.name: Electric Dreams Outfit
products.description: Coordinated set of hoodie and pants with complementary LED patterns. Features cloud-to-lightning animation themes.
products.imagePrompt: Matching LED hoodie and pants with electric blue and white lightning patterns, dramatic night sky, storm-inspired festival aesthetic, coordinated outfit styling

products.name: Frequency Rider Tee
products.description: Advanced tee with dual-zone LEDs - chest responds to mids/highs, back responds to bass frequencies.
products.imagePrompt: A black T-shirt with different LED zones on front and back showing contrasting patterns, person turning to show both sides, dual-exposure effect, technical music visualization

products.name: Rave Guardian Armor Tee

products.name: Aurora Festival Package
products.description: Complete festival experience with Aurora-themed LED patterns across tee, shorts, and accessories.
products.imagePrompt: A coordinated outfit set with Aurora Borealis inspired LED patterns in green, blue and purple, person against northern lights sky, magical natural phenomenon meets technology

products.name: Voltage Drop Tank Top
products.description: High-energy tank top with voltage-meter LED display that reacts to music intensity. Perfect for hot festival days.

products.name: Phoenix Rising Jacket
products.description: Statement jacket with phoenix-wing LED patterns on the back that spread and glow with music crescendos.
products.imagePrompt: A black jacket with large LED phoenix wing patterns on the back in orange, red and gold, dramatic festival lighting, mythical creature aesthetic, epic statement piece fashion

imageGenerationNote: Each prompt is designed to create square format images (1:1 aspect ratio) suitable for e-commerce product display. The prompts emphasize the YoruWear brand aesthetic combining festival culture, LED technology, music visualization, and modern fashion. All images should convey energy, innovation, and the unique interactive nature of LED-integrated clothing while maintaining a premium, desirable product appearance.
